nodes.text: Operation: Going Solo is a mini-game inspired by the NES and arcade classic Contra. It can be played in Konami's Star Wars: Force Collection digital card game all through the month of May 2017.
The mini-game is a four-level run-and-gun adventure featuring Han Solo blasting stormtroopers. It can yield special rewards for use in the regular game, including 5-star light and dark side cards.
